name: Elzette, Azamina of the White Forest
text: You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon 1 "White Forest" or "Azamina" monster from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Azamina" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field. If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can add 1 "Sinful Spoils" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Elzette, Azamina of the White Forest" once per turn.
